header.description:
A custom Armor pack that removes Armor Trims and can minimize the visible armor, or hide it completely.
Created by Brorenzo8194
header.name: Minimal Armor & Trims

modules.description:
A custom Armor pack that removes Armor Trims and can minimize the visible armor, or hide it completely.
Created by Brorenzo8194

subpacks.name: Removes all Armor Trims so that only Armor is visible.
Removes all Armor Trims and minimizes Armor so more of your skin is visible.
Removes all Armor Trims and Armor so only your skin is visible.

settings.text:
§lYou can configure this pack as follows:§r

• §l§gNo Trims Only§r: Removes all Armor Trims so that only Armor is visible.
• §l§3Minimal Armor - No Trims§r: Removes all Armor Trims and minimizes Armor so more of your skin is visible.
• §l§2Invisible Armor - No Trims§r: Removes all Armor Trims and Armor so only your skin is visible.

§7Any updates to the pack can be located on my Github: §bhttps://github.com/Brorenzo
